name: PoS-32
description: The merge is here! PoS-32 is a community-focused protocol allowing holders to seamlessly earn by participating in validating on the Ethereum Network by simply staking their $POS32 token. No need for ETH, no need for any technical know-how. PoS-32 Protocol handles all the complexities of staking, operating a validator node and rewards distribution. You simply stake and earn.
